Instruction: Drizzle the melted 1/4 cup butter over the chicken pieces in a greased 9x13 inch baking dish, then season with salt and pepper.

Continue baking the chicken pieces for about 45 minutes, uncovered, in the preheated oven. While the chicken cooks, mix together honey, molasses, mustard, curry powder, and the remaining butter in a medium saucepan. Simmer over medium heat for approximately 5 minutes to allow the flavors to combine.
Continue baking for an extra 15 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked and the sauce has melded with the chicken pieces to create a flavorful glaze.
